output.dependency: The name of the beer (one column) determines its style (another column), indicating that specific beer names are associated with certain styles.
The serving size (one column) is associated with the alcohol percentage (another column), suggesting that different serving sizes may impact or convey different alcohol content representations.
The brewery name (one column) is linked with its location (another column), indicating that the listed breweries are located in the specified city.
The city name (one column) is connected to the state abbreviation (another column), indicating that the city is located within the specified state.
The unique identifier for a beer (one column) can be related to another distinct identifier (another column), indicating that both columns are used to distinguish between different beer records.
